channel.title: Login problem
channel.description:
Hello, people are having trouble loggging into my server..... I Havn't portfowarded though. That's because people could get on my server so i skipped out the portfowarding. Note: people could get onto my server fine.
Now for some reason no one but me can get onto my server, i may have changed a few things inside the client.java and server.java, but i dont no how to fix this. And for some reason. i keep usin different sources and people still can't connect. where as before people could connect.
Please tell me how to fix this Note im currently using deltascape source.

item.title: Login problem
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Nuthing shows… Lool?..

Bannedfromheaven is now online! Connection from******:3236 Loggg: character file not found.

Read full topic

item.title: Login problem
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Lool… As soon as i click run.bat this comes up in the command prompt… lool?

Bannedfromheaven is now online!
You have no use for this… why would you want this?

Read full topic

item.title: Login problem
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello, people are having trouble loggging into my server…
I Havn’t portfowarded though.
That’s because people could get on my server so i skipped out the portfowarding.
Note: people could get onto my server fine.

Now for some reason no one but me can get onto my server, i may have changed a few things inside the client.java and server.java, but i dont no how to fix this.
And for some reason. i keep usin different sources and people still can’t connect. where as before people could connect.

Please tell me how to fix this
Note im currently using deltascape source.

Read full topic
